Control Name: 3.7.6 You have identified all services being utilized in Azure (and on-premise) that need to be measured.
Control Statement: Identifying and then monitoring all of the services and resources that make up a given workload helps ensure that you can respond quickly to any issues.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.7 How are you testing to ensure that you workload can appropriately handle user load?
